website_summaries.verdict: The Pronexa Hairgenics conditioner contains ingredients that encourage hair healing and regrowth.
pros: Works great in combination with the shampoo
Made with biotin, hydrolyzed marine collagen, seaweed extract, enriched vitamins and amino acids, hydrolyzed keratin and silk proteins
This conditioner helps to promote healthy hair growth while preventing dryness

customer_reviews.title: Undecided
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the shampoo (also purchased the conditioner), but when I use the 2 products together, my hair feels dirty and straw like. Could be that I am using too much conditioner, but not sure at this point. I have been using the shampoo with my regular "thickening conditioner" and my hair does appear to be fuller and softer. It's only been a week, so hopefully with more use, I will begin to believe the other reviews on this site. Still a wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: kimd

customer_reviews.title: Definitely smells good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I just used it. I'm going to keep updating my results.
customer_reviews.author: Operator 5.56

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works
customer_reviews.text: After trying the shampoo and seeing less hair loss so soon! I am continuing with the conditioner as well. Easy to use and makes my hair soft. Plus, the price point is easy for me to handle. My other shampoo and conditioner from Retail store was about 36.00 a bottle as well. I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: thicker hair
customer_reviews.text: very good shampoo. been using for almost a month and hair looks thicker!
customer_reviews.author: T C

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair Fuller and enriched
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. It makes your hair soft and I definitely noticed lesser hair loss than before. Worth trying it out!
customer_reviews.author: PRERNA VATSA

customer_reviews.title: Looking good
customer_reviews.text: I believe it's working, love how my hair is looking
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the results. I will definitely be buying again !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, you can see s difference in your hair after the 1st use
customer_reviews.author: Cpaine

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing. Have totally and immediately seen is difference in hair loss during routine. Pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Mom F

customer_reviews.title: Love this conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: My hair feels great after using this conditioner and there is much less shedding!
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: Strengthen and Stimulate new Hair Growth
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it help me strengthen and stimulate new hair growth. It totally stopped my hair from thinning. It also leaves a nice soft texture to your hair for styling. Great product with great results! -Orlando
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Decreased Hair Loss
customer_reviews.text: Within a few weeks of using this product I noticed a decrease in the amount of hair loss that I was experiencing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin A Culpepper

customer_reviews.title: Product is Working
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product is working well - I use it shampoo and the conditioner. I have noticeable new hair growing around my hairline. I have long hair - not too thick - very little goes a long way so even though it is a bit pricey, it lasts a long time. I would definitely recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: yogi417

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair soft and hair growth noted
customer_reviews.text: I have waited to write this review until after I used it for awhile. I can say that I have noted some new growth after a couple of months~ which is what I was hoping for. I use the conditioner with the shampoo- both products have a nice, light scent. You do not need to use much which makes it last longer and it leaves your hair soft as well. I am pleased with how well the products are working and am now recommending for my husband to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa LeoGrande

customer_reviews.title: It Works for Me!
customer_reviews.text: Works well with the Hairgenics Pronexa Clinical Strength Hair Shampoo. I have given these products time to see if they really work before writing this review and I have to say that they do work! I have lots of new hair growth and am delighted. Will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Maro Daro

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product that seems to really work
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a bottle of pronexa conditioner (along with the shampoo) and have found that this product works! I used it for several months in the last year and briefly switched to some cheaper alternatives, but after doing so I found that I was losing my hair again! When I switched back to pronexa, I really noticed a decrease in the amount of hair in my shower drain and am finding new growth in the spots where my hair had been thinning. I plan to buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Edward Foster

customer_reviews.title: I like this conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about a year and find it very satisfying. I have less hair loss than before I used the conditioner. Also my hair stylist told me that she found my hair in a better condition than before I used this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this shampoo. I have tried many thickening shampoos and conditioners and this as by far the best. Not only is my hair thicker, it is actually soft and shiny. I notice a lot less fallout in the drain. It smells so good. Fresh and minty. Compared to other shampoos that boast the same results (that do not deliver) the price is right as well. I would recommend the shampoo to anybody. I actually suffer from hypothyroidism.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Read review for shampoo, and that applies to the conditioner too.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerly36

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: less hair in the drain, smaller bottle than anticipated though
customer_reviews.author: animationgirl43

customer_reviews.title: Nioxin Alternative
customer_reviews.text: I have been having some hair loss and had used Nioxin in the past but I wanted to try something different so I order this product. It has a pleasant smell and you don't have to use a lot of the conditioner in order to get full coverage. I have noticed a difference in the amount of hair I am losing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love the way my hair feels
customer_reviews.text: Top quality conditioner. My hair feels hydrated and healthy. Smells great. Only conditioner I use now.
customer_reviews.author: The Write Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work....
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product 3 times but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: SUE

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this conditioner for about three weeks now along with the shampoo. It is too soon to tell whether my hair is growing back, but I do love the product. It smells great, it's ingredients are pretty clean and I love the way it makes my hair look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Zana

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the results
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 3 weeks and have noticed less hair loss than before I began using this product. I am pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: dot

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Hair Growth & Regrowth Conditioner along with the HairGenics Pronexa Clinical Strength Hair Regrowth Therapy Shampoo AND the Topical Hair Growth Serum and have been using all three HairGenics Pronexa porducts for two weeks. I followed the instructions from day one. Noticeable results were observed after the first few days of use. Starting with much lesser hair loss until now much thicker and stronger hairs. I think there must be new hair growth because my stylist notices, just yesterday, and that was very nice to hear. Nice products! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, super fast delivery and highly recommend dealing with this vendor! It leaves my salt & pepper hair very soft and manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Y. V. Benavidez

customer_reviews.title: I found that I like both the shampoo and conditioner and have not had ...
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair that I can sit on. I am very particular to conditioners because my hair tends to get very matted when I wash it, which required additional leave-in conditioner. I found that I like both the shampoo and conditioner and have not had to apply any other products to my hair. My hair felt thicker and hopefully with continued use it will get thicker. The price is okay and delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this conditioner along with their shampoo. It only takes a couple of pumps for the conditioner to fully coat my long hair, leaving it very silky and soft. I’m very impressed with the combination. My hair loss has slowed down tremendously. Very impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, love the feel, love the look. Product works great!
customer_reviews.author: Shellamb

customer_reviews.title: My reason to order Pronexa was to stop hairloss (I ...
customer_reviews.text: My reason to order Pronexa was to stop hairloss (I didn't need hair growth), and after a month of using this conditioner (every second day) I start to see positive results. I'm loosing less hair during showering and hairdrying. I am taking Pronexa vitamins as well (for a month). The bottle is small, but will last around a month and a half, if you will use it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Liudmyla S.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to stop hair loss, not sure yet about growth
customer_reviews.text: I'm 40 and losing my hair, and after starting to use this shampoo/conditioner offering about a month ago, it seems to slow or even stop the hair loss, although it's hard to say exactly because I've only been using it a month. I'm hoping that in a few more months there might be some regrowth as I've never used this type of shampoo/conditioner before. Aside from the hair loss situation, the products feel and smell very pleasant, and leave my hair in good shape. I'll circle back in a few months and update whether any growth has occurred.
customer_reviews.author: cts6540

customer_reviews.title: Works Great In Combination
customer_reviews.text: I am using both Hairgenics Pronexa Shampoo and Conditioner together and have noticed a difference! I see undergrowth and hair looks fuller and thicker. I also use in combination with the Supplement. Looking forward to better results in time.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J Riojas

customer_reviews.title: I have been using Hairgenics Pronexa Shampoo and Conditioner for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Hairgenics Pronexa Shampoo and Conditioner for about a month now, and have found that my bath tub strainer is filled with less hair then ever. I used to clean out my strainer every other day, but now I do it just once a week and don't lose much hair anymore. I generally have thin hair, but the Pronexa shampoo paired with the conditioner has made my hair stronger and fuller.
customer_reviews.author: Kealoha

customer_reviews.title: An excellent conditioner.
customer_reviews.text: Thicker and more robust than my other conditioner. My hair feels much softer and fuller after using.
customer_reviews.author: steve bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Bought shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews online, pretty good. I just received my shampoo and conditioner. I read this product does help with hair loss and that is exactly what I need since my hair is thinning. I read it has good chemicals like biotin in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about three weeks in combination with the Pronexa shampoo and I'm very satisfied with the results. I'm shedding considerably less, and my hair feels softer and shinier. I used to have very itchy scalp and that has resolved since using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this conditioner, need only a little and hair become silky
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: I was having problems with my hair thinning and falling ...
customer_reviews.text: I was having problems with my hair thinning and falling out. I did tons of research on products that would help me combat the problem I was having. After lots of looking and reading reviews, I stumbled upon this conditioner and the matching shampoo and it has been a godsend. I purchased the Shampoo, Conditioner and vitamin supplements and all I can say it that I wish I had found these products sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Ivllo78

customer_reviews.title: Beware 5 star rating, it’s false because it’s bribed.
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t work for me at all which would be OK except that I went off the 5 star rating. Beware, the five star ratings are all bribed with free product. Note that many of the ratings give 5 stars but say they just received it and its still too soon to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hart

customer_reviews.title: So far it Seems to be working great. Noticing less hair loss in my brush and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it Seems to be working great. Noticing less hair loss in my brush and on the bathroom counter. Leaves my hair feeling soft and tangle free.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: I am taking three items to keep the hair I have and possibly regrow some that has been lost. Seems to be working in under a month. i will continue, but for the time being it is nice to have things move in this direction as opposed to where it was leading without these products. I mention this in my other review and this conditioner is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Coffinjerk

customer_reviews.title: Will keep you posted on hair growth
customer_reviews.text: I don't wash my hair daily so when I do I don't want a conditioner that weighs my hair down. So far very pleased. Will keep you posted on hair growth. I’m curious the seller told me to give them five stars for a free product is this a scam? Because I have not received my free product.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Leiferman

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing. Hair is dry after multiple uses. Company says you get a free bottle for a 5 star review, that is not true.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bronson

customer_reviews.title: ... using this product for about 3 weeks and I like how soft it makes my hair feel
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 3 weeks and I like how soft it makes my hair feel. I was originally concerned about how small the bottle was but I realized that a little goes along way. Other products I have used makes my scalp itch but this product feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie D.

customer_reviews.title: works great for cleaning scalp
customer_reviews.text: I only use this for my scalp and it keeps it very clean even without washing for 2-3 days. When a conditioner works great on my scalp, they tend to dry out my hair shaft, so I didn't even bother using it for this, I'll use a different conditioner keeping it away from the scalp, that way my scalp is still clean, but hair still shiny. This product didn't improve my thinning hair, but I'll still buy this b/c it actually keeps my scalp clean.
customer_reviews.author: MaggDalena

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair feel matted.
customer_reviews.text: Shampoo was nice but needed extra different conditioner as this product make my hair feel like straw and very hard to comb through.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be working. It washes well and conditions hair too. The bottles are small but do last awhile...I have been also using IRestore laser cap...My hair is coming back no doubt, this is helping.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Results
customer_reviews.text: I love this product line. The conditioner does not weigh my hair down but lightens and brightens my hair.
customer_reviews.author: C. Adamich

customer_reviews.title: Much healthier hair with this!
customer_reviews.text: I really love both shampoo and conditioner. My hair are thin and dangle easily but the conditioner is awesome! Just need a pea size to be efficient. I have been using both for a while and I am starting to see a difference in my scalp. There is hope! Real pictures about 3 months apart.
customer_reviews.author: luciw

customer_reviews.title: I'm hopeful... with a disclaimer
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different products claiming to stop hair loss and encourage regrowth. I'm hoping this combo is the one, although I realize it may be months (and several orders) before I see results. Therefore, I am writing a five-star review, not because I have seen results at this point, but because I've been offered a free product if I do so. That's my disclaimer. The conditioner has a nice texture, goes on well, and smells good. I am also taking hair specific vitamins. I am a 65 year old woman with significantly thinning hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only product you need for hair loss!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering some hair loss with age, and have been unhappy about it - so tried this product a while back and have made several repeat orders. I find that it seems to work to, at the least, slow hair loss if not stopping it in its tracks. After several months of using it, my hair seemed fuller. I stopped using it for a while and found that my hairbrush was showing signs of more hair loss again, so recently bought another month's supply and intend not to let it lapse anymore. There are no miracle cures for hair loss, but this product does what it claims to and is safe to use. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Belen

customer_reviews.title: Product worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the product works. Used to use another product and the formula changed... so I had to find something else that worked. I wish it was a little less expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: $40 for a bottle that’s no bigger than your hand. Unless you got money to spend, look elsewhere!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate to be one of those reviewer‘s that leaves a review and says they don’t know if the product works or not because they haven’t used it long enough, but unless you’re made of money you’d never know if this stuff works or not because it’s so EXPENSIVE. I got 5 WASHES out of the one bottle before it was gone. My hair is THIN and 2 inches past my shoulders. I don’t have much hair. It didn’t have very fragrant smell, which doesn’t matter to me but it also didn’t make my hair feel soft or moisturized which does matter. I’ll be trying a less expensive DHT blocking conditioner from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: Please do not waste money on this product. It does nothing to your specially after their shampoo strip your hair from all the moister. There is no way this product have any hydrating elements. i never had any problem with hydrating hair. Now my hair is so dry i have to do deep conditioning treatment to restore the moister to my hair. this is awful
customer_reviews.author: Basemah

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I’m on my third bottle. I put in my hair at night and sleep w/ a satin cap and rinse, wash, condition in a.m. Def strengthens your hair. I don’t dry or straighten my hair but I do have highlights and lowlights and very long hair so it’s very important to me to keep it as healthy as possible.
customer_reviews.author: C. Leone

customer_reviews.title: I love this conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I love this conditioner. About a year ago I had lost a lot of weight quickly and suffered substantial hair loss. I researched hair loss products and found that Pronexa has Biotin in it. I've been using the conditioner as well as the shampoo and my hair is finally looking like it did a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, softens hair and soothes scalp
customer_reviews.text: Wanted some nourishing hair products as the hot winter has led to my scalp being dry and sensitive, and my hair has been looking really dry and damaged. I bought this as my family has a history of baldness and I figured this might head off any thinning, and so far I've seen my hair overnight look shinnier and softer.
customer_reviews.author: Alaine gonz

customer_reviews.title: I do like how my hair feels
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it works, maybe too soon. I do like how my hair feels. With the supplement ls, my hair seems to have stopped falling out. It’s been only 2 months so far. Will update again in 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Barnard

customer_reviews.title: My hair seems healthier
customer_reviews.text: I have hair that easily tangles anytime I wash it. So when I got the Pronexa shampoo, I decided to try this coordinating conditioner in the hopes it would detangle my hair as well as other conditioners, and it's done a great job. My hair really seems to be healthier though so I'll continue using this a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Buneeb

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This is awful. I’d rather use dish soap irs terrible. Completely awful. And they scam you by offering free stuff to con you into a positive rating
customer_reviews.author: Flygirl

customer_reviews.title: Love the changes!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started using this product and was hoping for the best. I am happy to say the difference I have seen in my hair exceeded "the best". My hair is softer and I, like others, have experienced less shedding. I will definitely continue using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli E

customer_reviews.title: Really Works !!!! Give It ATry
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shampoo & conditioner out of desperation. My hair suddenly started shedding consistently. My health is fine. I started researching & found this gave it a try. I am so happy I found these products. Only after 3 shampoos & conditioning my hair is thicker shinier & the best has stopped falling out. I will continue to always use these products. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Evans

customer_reviews.title: Quick but staying results
customer_reviews.text: Very excited to receive this product. My friend had told me that considering the fact that this is a hair product the results are quite immediate compared to others. Even after the first use the feeling of nourishment and nutritional reinforcement was already felt! And after that it worked exactly as advertised. My hair looks and responds so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Jeongbo

customer_reviews.title: The conditions goes a long way and little is needed but it really makes my hair easy to comb through
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this conditioner along with the shampoo and this has helped with breakage and hair loss. The conditions goes a long way and little is needed but it really makes my hair easy to comb through. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri B.

customer_reviews.title: Working so far...
customer_reviews.text: Along with Pronexa shampoo, the conditioner helps keep your hair feeling smooth and doesn't dry out your scalp. Both products have worked great so far. I will give it until the recommended 6 months and update this review. I would also recommend using a biotin supplement as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Hair growth conditioner works great with the same shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Makes my hair feel great. Lots of body and seeing hair growth
customer_reviews.author: Konagal

customer_reviews.title: Less Hair Loss
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Hairgenics Pronexa Hair Loss Therapy Conditioner – Hair Growth & Regrowth Conditioner With Biotin & Keratin Repairs Damage and Helps Regrow Thinning Hair and it really works. I use it with the HairGenics Pronexa Clinical Strength Hair Regrowth Therapy Shampoo With Biotin and I will say that I have definitely noticed a lot less hair loss. I have also noticed that this product does make my hair softer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and stronger hair
customer_reviews.text: Excellent regeneration of dry and damaged hair. I had very damaged hair because of its appearance after using the hair straightener almost every day. After a few months they were badly damaged and fell out. I tried everything and finally found this conditioner. After a few uses, the hair was healthier and rebuilt and falls out less. In addition, they are easy to comb and are extremely soft to the touch. Despite the high price, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Malgorzata  Raczy

customer_reviews.title: ... for just over two months and I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the conditioner along with the shampoo and serum now for just over two months and I am very happy with this product. The conditioner does not make my hair feel greasy after application and provides some thickness and manageability. I am very pleased with this product and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: paul12345

customer_reviews.title: Actually grows hair . Thickens And replenishes your hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair thinned out terribly due to medications. I had a few random bald spots and very thin fine damaged hair. In the short time using this product I've notuced a huge difference in my hair. It's grown back some and already my hair is begining to cover my scalp. I'm very impressed in the amazing growth and how healthy my hair has become! Haven't used. It a month yet , and there is a difference in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stava

customer_reviews.title: Good conditioner and makes my hair fuller and smoother
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this biotin conditioner along with Pura D'or gold label anti-hair loss shampoo for my hair loss for about 3 months. After utilizing it every other day, I am happy with the results. At the beginning of using it, I noticed more hair falling out. But, after about a week, it started to show a reduction in hair loss dramatically. Also, my hair is getting fuller and thicker than before. Also, this conditioner makes my hair smoother and softer than just the shampoo itself without the conditioner. I will continue to use this combination as it has been showing a promising result.
customer_reviews.author: PY

customer_reviews.title: My new hair obsession product
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing conditioner. I'm very picky on my hair products and now I do NOT have to look any further. This is my new LOVE!!! Thank you for making such a great product. I also use the shampoo and it's just as great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Thicker Hair!
customer_reviews.text: For context, I’m a man in his 20’s with rather thin hair. I’ve always hated having thin hair because my skin can show at certain angles. After using this product, I feel like my hair is thicker when I run my hand through it. Would definitely continue using this to see higher results!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Another great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Pronexa shampoo for over 6 months and have seen my dormant hair actually start growing again. I recently purchased the conditioner and I live the way it makes my hair feel. Another great product.
customer_reviews.author: jv03fb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be helping with my hair shedding. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money - Smells like mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the smell. It was like I wash washing my hair with mouthwash. There’s no foam to the shampoo so I kept adding more water but I could never get good coverage. I only used it for two weeks so I don’t know if it worked. There has to be better products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne H. Black

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work and its very expensive. I bought the conditioner and treatment as well . Didn't leave my hair soft and broke all my highlights
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Peguero

customer_reviews.title: I just loved the product
customer_reviews.text: I just loved the product. I was changing product so frequently as I was having too much hair fall and then I found Hairgenics hair growth supplement which made my hair lot more stronger and hair fall reduced a lot. I would highly recommend this product to anyone who is suffering from hair loss.I am using the whole kit with shampoo, conditioner and hair growth supplement which is awesome. My hair looks much strong and beautiful than before.
customer_reviews.author: Abhisek

customer_reviews.title: Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was terrible Shampoo was opened and waste some of the shampoo...
customer_reviews.author: elde ralph besijos

customer_reviews.title: Does its job!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product out when I noticed I was losing hair--not exactly in patches, but just all over. For example, when I tie up my hair, my ponytail isn't very fat. I have very long, long hair and one friend recommended that I cut it short, making it easier to maintain. I absolutely did not want to do this, so I turned to this product instead. I have noticed that my hair loss problem isn't as severe anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Pronexa shampoo and conditioner the last couple months. I love how much stronger my hair feels with this shampoo. The conditioner leaves it shiny and easy to manage.
customer_reviews.author: La La

customer_reviews.title: Hair Loss Reversal
customer_reviews.text: I started losing tons of hair & it wasn’t growing back! I started using the Pronexa every other day & can see a BIG difference in my hair loss & thickness. I have thin fine hair & losing it is really noticeable. I have only been using this s week & am very happy so far. Will def be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Feel!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product sofar. It makes your hair feel really soft and manageable. Still not sure on the growth factor, but will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: "darkangel_00100"

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. There is an invigorating smell almost like tea tree and you can feel it penetrating into your hair and scalp. I'm 35 years old and have noticed that in the last year my hair is thinning and starting to fall out more although it is still quite thick. I did not have to use much product or really have to work it through for it to untangle my hair and this was the first time I hardly lost any hair washing and conditioning it. It is non-greasy and non-drying as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Hairloss conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Hairgenics Pronexa Hair Loss Therapy Conditioner is a great addition to their shampoo , it does help stop the loss
customer_reviews.author: michael r moore

customer_reviews.title: but I can say that the shampoo and conditioner make my hair look and feel absolutely beautiful. I can tell this is going to be .
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the shampoo and conditioner. I am unable to try the supplements due to digestive issues, but I can say that the shampoo and conditioner make my hair look and feel absolutely beautiful. I can tell this is going to be a very good experience for me. I am 67 years old with long silver hair, and I have never used products that left my hair so manageable, silky, and soft. I love these products.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Dry and damaged to soft, shinny and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is dry and damaged from coloring and highlighting. I read a lot of great reviews, so I decided to spend the extra money and try this product. After my first use, I was so amazed at how soft and healthy my hair felt? Two days later, my hair still felt soft and looked great! I LOVE this product and am so glad I tried it!
customer_reviews.author: Karin Leuze

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and hair feels voluminous
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had thin hair since I was a kid, so I’ve tried many shampoos, this one smells great like peppermint and my hair feeling clean. I have been using this shampoo along with the conditioner, serum and supplements and I’m starting to feel more volume at my roots! I’ve only been doing this routine for 3 weeks so far and great results!
customer_reviews.author: Samira Salem

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product! Works great in just three weeks! Visible improvement to hair thickness and growth.
customer_reviews.author: Blumufun

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping I'd like this product but ... meh. I'm not a fan. I've used high-end hair products for years. Thought I'd give this one a try. I'm disappointed and will not be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: finally i find the products it work for me.
customer_reviews.text: this my first shampoo , That’s really the ultimate testimonial one can give or get for a product... when people that have no clue you are using or doing anything different and start asking you what did you do to your hair. Definitely a great and solid product, could always be cheaper, but then again other hair growth conditioners with high quality hair products.
customer_reviews.author: Corren Kun

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking to regrow hair! I have seen such a dramatic difference in the four months I have been using it. Don;t get me wrong, my hair isn't flowing in the wind, but I now see hair where I only saw peach-fuzz before! This product, used as directed, will change your life - just make sure you are consistent with its use! Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: i do not recommend that you waste your money bcus I brought the aconditioner and shampoo but i didn’t see any difference 🤷🏻‍♂️ But is your decision
customer_reviews.author: christian

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels good!
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell yet if it works, but i'm hoping it'll slow down my parting line. Will update review after another couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Defarias

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought one bottle of Pronexa shampoo and one bottle of Pronexa conditioner in Amazon, I received the products yesterday and I used in the same time. I liked it smell to menthol/eucalyptus and I had a good sensation in my scalp, something effervescent but good. I hope these products help me to solve my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Azuaje

customer_reviews.title: Hair happy
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product and waited to write a honest review until I finished the shampoo, conditioner, and bonding complex all gone. I wanted my hair to be stronger, as I already have full hair. I wanted to prevent breakage. It shocked me that I had new hair coming in! I noticed around my hairline more growth happening! So yes, it definitely does what it says!
customer_reviews.author: Tim & Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Less frizz
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times so I don't know if it will help my thinning hair, but I will tell you my hair is soft and less frizz. And that's saying something on a rainy day like today! It's pretty expensive so I really hope it does help build my hair back.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth m baker

customer_reviews.title: Prompt Shipping, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The bottles were smaller than I anticipated but shipping was very prompt and customer service is good. Since taking an antidepressant I've been experiencing hair loss and after lots of research, this brand seemed the most reliable and with the best results. I'm really looking forward to my new hair growth although I know it will probably take a couple months to see noticeable results.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Shafer

customer_reviews.title: JURY STILL OUT
customer_reviews.text: Again, like the shampoo I like the feel of my hair but still need time to see any real results.
customer_reviews.author: J. F.

product_meta.title: Hairgenics Pronexa Hair Loss Therapy Conditioner – Hair Growth & Regrowth Conditioner With Biotin, DHT Blockers and Keratin Repairs Damage and Helps Regrow Thinning Hair and Stop Hair Loss.
product_meta.description:
Hairgenics understands the science of healthy hair. 

Our Pronexa Hair Growth and Healing Conditioner contains a proprietary blend of clinically proven hair nourishing ingredients including Keratin, Biotin, Silk Proteins and Marine to deeply moisturize and heal dry and damaged hair while reducing hair loss, hair thinning and shedding, and adding body, thickness, and volume to your hair. This combination of ingredients infuses your hair with moisture resulting in softer, shinier and healthier hair and is ideal for all types of hair and the perfect choice for both Men and Women.

Pronexa Conditioner also contains clinically researched levels of Biotin and Keratin for maximum conditioning, hair growth and health, helping hair grow longer, healthier, thicker and softer. Propidren also contains clinically proven DHT blockers including Saw Palmetto Extract which effectively block DHT and prevent hair loss.

Clinical studies on hair loss have shown that the number one factor in hair loss is the production of dihydrotestosterone or DHT. DHT is a molecule inside of your body that's responsible for hair loss, so prohibiting the production of this hormone is key to preventing hair loss. Pronexa Conditioner contains Saw Palmetto and other powerful DHT blockers that help prevent DHT production. The result is that hair loss is stopped and hair growth and regrowth is thicker and healthier.

For the best results, use for at least 3 months and utilize the complete Pronexa Hair Care System including our Pronexa Shampoo, Serum and Supplement that will help you achieve that full, thick and healthy looking hair that you want.

Get fuller, thicker and healthier hair today. Your satisfaction is guaranteed with a 100% Money Back Guarantee!
feature_bullets: USDA Biobased Certified Product, Certified Organic Ingredients and Sulfate Free! The amazing hair healing and regrowth ingredients include: Biotin, Hydrolyzed Marine Collagen, Seaweed Extract, Enriched Vitamins and Amino Acids, Hydrolyzed Keratin and Silk Proteins; as well as an array of DHT Blockers to help combat hair loss and thinning.

Contains clinically researched levels of Biotin for maximum hair growth and health. Biotin not only promotes healthy hair growth but also prevents hair dryness. Biotin also increases the elasticity of the hair cortex, thereby strengthening hair, minimizing hair breakage and helping hair grow longer, healthier and thicker.

Scientific research on hair loss has shown that the number one factor in hair loss is the production of dihydrotestosterone or DHT. Pronexa Conditioner contains clinically proven DHT blockers including Saw Palmetto Extract which effectively block DHT and prevent hair loss.

Pronexa Hair Loss Conditioner has been specially formulated to address the key conditions that contribute to hair loss and thinning hair as well as repair dry and damaged hair for full, thick, voluminous, shiny and healthy looking hair! For the best results, use for at least 6 months and use with Pronexa Shampoo and Supplement to help you achieve that full, thick and healthy looking hair that you want.
Only the best, and highest purity ingredients go into our products! 100% Money Back Guarantee for any reason.
